title: The Glimmering Ruins
trigger_condition: Player enters an abandoned urban area at night
description: As you navigate the skeletal remains of the old city, a faint, rhythmic pulsing of blue light catches your eye from a half-collapsed office building. The glow seems to emanate from the basement level, accompanied by a low, resonant hum that vibrates through the rubble.

choices.option: Investigate the source of the light
choices.consequence: Discover a functional pre-collapse power core, gaining +15 Energy Cells but attracting a pack of mutated scavengers.

choices.option: Mark the location and leave quietly
choices.consequence: Avoid immediate danger and gain a map marker for future exploration, but the opportunity may be lost if not returned to within 3 days.
Gain the element of surprise against any creatures drawn to the light, yielding +2 Mutant Teeth and +1 Rare Component, but risk exposure to residual radiation.
